Mirazus Salehin

I work at the intersection of AI, computer vision, and agricultural engineering, building data-driven systems for real-world applications. My experience includes deep learning, multispectral UAV imagery, image processing, spectroscopy, from data acquisition to deployment.

I focus on creating solutions that are robust, interpretable, and deployable, not just accurate. My goal is to turn advanced algorithms into practical tools for precision agriculture and sustainable farming.

Research topics

My research includes but not limited to....

Precision Agriculture

Agri-robotics

Micro-controller development

UAV based monitoring

Hyperspectral imaging

Deep learning

AI × Computer Vision × Agriculture

Intelligent systems from data to deployment
